text: Roderick Anderson "Roddy" Maude-Roxby (born 2 April 1930) is an English actor and comedian. He has appeared in numerous many, such as Walt Disney's The Aristocats, where he appeared as Edgar Balthazar; Unconditional Love; and Clint Eastwood's White Hunter Black Heart, playing Thompson. ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from London Category:Comedians from London
title: Roddy Maude-Roxby
